entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023
